fields.name: Mosaic
fields.description: This intricate mosaic was found in the ruins of Pompeii and depicts scenes from ancient Roman life.

fields.name: Amphora
fields.description: This well-preserved amphora was unearthed in the ruins of Pompeii and likely held wine or olive oil.

fields.name: Statue
fields.description: This imposing marble statue of a Roman senator was discovered in the ancient city of Rome.

fields.name: Coin
fields.description: This well-preserved Roman coin was minted in the city of Rome and found during archaeological excavations.

fields.name: Fresco
fields.description: This vibrant fresco adorned the walls of a villa in Herculaneum and showcases ancient Roman artistry.

fields.name: Snake Bracelet
fields.description: This gold bracelet was found amidst the ruins of Herculaneum and provides insight into daily life in ancient times.

fields.name: Scarab
fields.description: This intricately carved scarab beetle amulet was found in an ancient Egyptian tomb.

fields.name: Hieroglyphs
fields.description: These well-preserved hieroglyphs were discovered on the walls of a temple in ancient Egypt, offering insight into the civilization's language and culture.
